description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and control ghosts. The user can project their own spirit as an astral form that is intangible and can change size, as well as create various types of ghost minions with different effects.

abilities.description: Creates palm-sized miniature ghosts that can swarm opponents and be detonated.
Detonates Mini Hollows with a finger snap, creating powerful explosions.

strengths: Astral projection is intangible and immune to physical attacks
Can create multiple types of ghosts with different effects
Explosive ghost attacks can deal massive damage
Negative Hollows can incapacitate opponents emotionally
weaknesses: Physical body is vulnerable while projecting astral form
Astral form cannot physically harm opponents directly
Users who are already extremely negative are immune to Negative Hollows

keyMoments.description: Perona demonstrates size manipulation with her astral projection, appearing as a giant then shrinking.
Perona phases through Usopp's body, revealing both the terror and the limitation that she cannot physically harm him in astral form.
Mini Hollow technique is revealed as Perona summons numerous small ghosts.
Ghost Rap technique is revealed as Perona detonates Mini Hollows with explosive force.
Usopp discovers the critical weakness - Perona's physical body is defenseless in her hidden room while she projects her astral form.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that transforms the user's body into rubber, granting them the ability to stretch, bounce, and resist blunt attacks.

abilities.description: Luffy stretches his fingers into a net formation to catch or counter attacks.

keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Fingernet for the first time to counter Moria's Brick Bat swarm attack.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to manifest and control shadows as physical entities, steal shadows from others, and use shadows to reanimate corpses as zombies.

keyMoments.description: Moria uses his Doppelman shadow clone to intercept and attack Luffy, demonstrating continued mastery of shadow manipulation.
